div.h4: Hazen Union School is committed to maintaining an accessible website.
div.p: We are committed to ensuring that this website achieves “Level AA” conformance to the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0. As we add more content to the site, we will be checking for conformance through the use of the WebAIM tool. We are aware of some areas on the website where we could improve accessibility. We are currently working to achieve this. We hope that this website will achieve “Level AA” conformance to the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0 by June 21, 2021.
div.h6: Our proposed timeline for implementing further accessibility:

table.summary: A table of contact information for contact the school about accessibility issues.

div.h6: If you have problems using any section of the website, would like alternatives to access the information contained within or have feedback for usability or needs please contact us.
